name: @yasharf/semantic-auto-release
description: Automated release workflow for JavaScript/TypeScript projects using semantic-release, Conventional Commits, and changelog updates.
author: Yashar Fakhari

scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && mocha --require sinon --recursive 'test/unit/**/*.test.js'
scripts.test:live: npm run clean && npm run build && mocha 'test/live/**/*.integration.test.js'
scripts.scenario:classic: ACTION=capture-scenario SCENARIO=classic CHECKS=build,test APPROVALS=2 node scripts/repo-admin.js
scripts.scenario:rules: ACTION=capture-scenario SCENARIO=rules CHECKS=build,test APPROVALS=2 node scripts/repo-admin.js
scripts.scenario:rules-codescan-signed: ACTION=capture-scenario SCENARIO=rules_codescan_signed CHECKS=build,test APPROVALS=2 node scripts/repo-admin.js
scripts.scenario:classic-signed: ACTION=capture-scenario SCENARIO=classic_signed CHECKS=build,test APPROVALS=2 node scripts/repo-admin.js
scripts.scenario:classic-rules-codescan-signed: ACTION=capture-scenario SCENARIO=classic_rules_codescan_signed CHECKS=build,test APPROVALS=2 node scripts/repo-admin.js
